headline: Quick Custom Intelligence Welcomes Xavier Grace as Customer Engagement Manager
summary: Industry veteran to elevate client relationships and maximize customer success Xavier Grace Xavier Grace SAN DIEGO, Aug. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Quick Custom Intelligence (QCI), the global leader in AI-driven analytics for the gaming and hospitality sector, today announced that Xavier Grace has joined the company as Customer Engagement Manager.
